firestore.reasoning: The Firestore data structure is designed to support the PromptForge AI application, focusing on user-generated content. The structure prioritizes authorization independence, clarity, and scalability. User data, prompts, and analyses are segregated into separate collections with clear ownership. Path-based ownership `/users/{userId}/prompts/{promptId}` and `/users/{userId}/analyses/{analysisId}` is used because each piece of content is owned by a specific user. This design avoids `get()` calls in security rules, enhancing security and enabling atomic operations.
